name: orthodontia
description: Change braces to the way you like them.

scripts.build: browserify src/orthodontia.js src/background.js src/options.js -p [ factor-bundle -o dist/orthodontia.js -o dist/background.js -o dist/options.js ] > NUL
scripts.watch: watchify -v --debug src/orthodontia.js src/background.js src/options.js -p [ factor-bundle -o dist/orthodontia.js -o dist/background.js -o dist/options.js ] -o dummy.js
scripts.prewatch: echo "Watch Limitation: Changes to anything besides js files will not automatically be copied to dist/"

author: Benjamin Brandtner
